name: h3
description: The 2024 Easton Ghost Advanced Drop 9 Fastpitch Softball Bat is engineered for players seeking top-notch performance and comfort. Certified by USSSA, USA Softball (ASA), NSA, ISA, and WBSC, this bat features a balanced swing feel that caters to a wide range of playing styles. Its sleek black and red colorway complements the two-piece composite design, which includes the innovative Sonic Comp Max material for superior durability. The Double Barrel 3 design ensures optimal pop and a massive sweet spot, while the ConneXion Evolution connector piece enhances power and minimizes sting for an unparalleled hitting experience. With a barrel diameter of 2 1/4 inches, this bat is crafted to elevate your game with exceptional balance and performance.
